docs.snippet: Canadian rapper Drake helped music streaming services explode in 2016, rising by 76 percent in the United States to overtake digital sales of music for the first time in history, Nielsen Music said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian rapper Drake helped music streaming services explode in 2016, rising by 76 percent in the United States to overtake digital sales of music for the first time in history, Nielsen Music said on Thursday.

headline.main: Streaming Overtakes U.S. Digital Music Sales for First Time: Nielsen
headline.print_headline: Streaming Overtakes U.S. Digital Music Sales for First Time: Nielsen

docs.snippet: The lengthy death of a condemned killer who snorted and gasped in Ohio's death chamber was unlike anything the leader of the state's execution team had seen before, the executioner said in federal court....
docs.lead_paragraph: The lengthy death of a condemned killer who snorted and gasped in Ohio's death chamber was unlike anything the leader of the state's execution team had seen before, the executioner said in federal court.

headline.main: Executioner Says He Was Puzzled by Inmate's 26-Minute Death

docs.snippet: A federal jury in Massachusetts is due on Thursday to begin deliberating on whether to sentence to death a former drifter who admitted to the brutal fatal stabbings and strangling of three men during a multi-day 2001 rampage....

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump has selected former Indiana Sen. Dan Coats to lead the Office of the Director of National Intelligence, a role that would thrust him into the center of the intelligence community that Trump has publicly challenged, a p...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump has selected former Indiana Sen. Dan Coats to lead the Office of the Director of National Intelligence, a role that would thrust him into the center of the intelligence community that Trump has publicly challenged, a person with knowledge of the decision said Thursday.

headline.main: Trump Selects Former Sen. Coats for Top Intelligence Post
headline.print_headline: Trump Selects Former Sen. Coats for Top Intelligence Post
